mapper.select: select count(*) from booking where carno=#{carno} and reqmem=#{reqmem}
mapper.insert: insert into booking(bookno, carno, resmem, reqmem, seatnum) values(book_seq.nextval, #{carno}, #{resmem}, #{reqmem}, #{seatnum})
mapper.select: select B.bookno, B.seatnum, B.status C.*, M.* from booking B, carpool C, member M where B.carno = C.carno and B.resmem = M.mno and B.reqmem = #{reqmem}
